messages.content: What are the custom nodes provided by ComfyUI_Fictiverse?
ComfyUI_Fictiverse provides custom nodes such as Color Correction, Displace Images with Mask, Add Noise to Image with Mask, and Displace Image with Depth.
Is the Color Correction node still in use?
No, the Color Correction node is obsolete.
What is the function of the Displace Images with Mask node?
The Displace Images with Mask node is a modified version of the WAS node that displaces images from a mask with directional amplitudes.
What does the Add Noise to Image with Mask node do?
The Add Noise to Image with Mask node adds noise to an image inside a given mask.
What is the aim of the Displace Image with Depth node?
The Displace Image with Depth node tries to displace an image based on its depth.
How do I install the ComfyUI_Fictiverse custom nodes?

To install ComfyUI_Fictiverse, first install ComfyUI. Then, clone the ComfyUI_Fictiverse repository into the custom_nodes folder inside your ComfyUI installation or download the contents as a zip and unzip to the custom_nodes/ComfyUI_Fictiverse folder. Finally, start or restart ComfyUI.
